title: BM25 code-aware tokenization
description: Pre-split camelCase/snake_case in embedding text before calling index_text(). getUserProfile -> 'getUserProfile get User Profile'. Apply same splitting to search queries. Zero inference cost, improves keyword recall for identifier-style queries. Long-term: request custom tantivy tokenizer support in omendb TextSearchConfig.

logs.msg: ACL 2021 research confirms camelCase/snake_case splitting improves BM25 NDCG@10 by +35% avg on code (up to +58% PHP, +50% Java). Implementation: transform 'getUserProfile' -> 'getUserProfile get User Profile' before index_text(). Apply same to queries. Filed omendb request for custom tantivy tokenizer: omendb/cloud/custom-tokenizer-text-search.md
Implemented split_identifiers() in src/tokenize.rs. Applied to index_text() and search query. Fixed boost.rs camelCase bug. Fixed invalid regex in text.rs.
